title: Ruth, Cobb, Johnson, Young - Sale or Trade

posts.post_title: Ruth, Cobb, Johnson, Young - Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dustin
     I have the following cards for Sale or Trade.  I am interested in any vintage of like value and I am happy to either trade up or trade down.  I am mainly looking for tobacco or caramel cards of bigger names (Wagner, Cobb, etc.), but would consider any vintage.  Thanks, and email works best.

TY COBB - SOLD!!!


[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/JohnsonSGC50.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/JohnsonSGC50back.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]


[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/RuthSGC30.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
[IMG][IMG]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c3/jdtcards/RuthSGC30back.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]


CY YOUNG - SOLD!!!

Thank you for your time.
Dustin Thompson
